Keratin Treatments

This in-salon service infuses natural keratin deep into hair’s cuticle reducing frizz and curl and instantly adding amazing shine, silkiness and condition to the hair. Clients rave that “this is a life-changing experience”. Hair is more manageable, smoother and easier to style than ever before. It is safe for even color-treated and chemically processed hair.

Keratin Complex starts at$475

Brazilian Blowout starts at$475

Keratin Express Blowout $150

Split-End Treatment $50
